a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: The median age splits the population into two equal groups, with as many people older than it as people younger
than it. Future projections are based on the UN medium-fertility scenario.

g.text: Median age - Sex: all - Age: all - Variant: estimates

text.tspan: Data source: United Nations, World Population Prospects (2022)
